just throwing this out there:
- BRL-CAD is huge
- i have an old laptop
- scanning every file takes a long time, so even builds where only one file changed can take quite long

so, what if it used tup? (http://gittup.org/tup/)

@Peter Pronai as far as CAD systems go, BRL-CAD should be 10x-100x bigger still. ;)
that said, have you tried ninja? cmake produces ninja builds and they are substantially faster than make builds.
@Sean haven't tried it yet, but I'll run a benchmark while I do my cleaning
